site2.title: Music
site2.description:
prixlautfm: <Laut FM>
prixradio: 1 - 96
prixplay: <Youtube Song>
prixstop: Stop the Music
prixstream: <mp3 stream>
prixrandom: play an random Mp3

site3.title: Settings
site3.description:
prixsetprefix: set a new prefix
prixprefix: shows you prefix
prixresetprefix: resets your prefix
prixsetchannel: set an reconnect channel
prixrmchannel: remove the reconnect channel
